channel.title: Softlayer_billing_item_newcustomersetup on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_billing_item_newcustomersetup on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_NewCustomerSetup
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_NewCustomerSetup Datatype Description Local allowCancellationFlag Flag to check if a billing item can be cancelled. 1 = yes. 0 = no. Type: integer associatedBillingItemId This is sometimes populated for orphan billing items that are not attached to servers. Billing items like secondary portable IP addresses fit into this category. A user may set an association by calling [[SoftLayer_Billing_Item::setAssociationId]]. This will cause this orphan item to appear under its associated server billing item on future invoices.
